metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1999014 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: FFmpeg before commit bab0716c7f4793ec42e05a5aa7e80d82a0dd4e75 contains anout of array access vulnerability in MXF format demuxer that can result inDoS. This attack appear to be exploitable via specially crafted MXF filewhich has to be provided as input. This vulnerability appears to have beenfixed in bab0716c7f4793ec42e05a5aa7e80d82a0dd4e75 and later.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
kino: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
